data.name: Godlike
data.detailed_description:
The burden of reign and the fate of the entire north now belongs to your dynasty. Rule as a ruthless, distraught and invincible viking, or as a tolerant konung who follows fashion trends. But remember that Valhalla is a place for worthy individuals.

History:


  • An unusual story of the formation of your reign awaits you
  • Each character from your dynasty has its own reign destiny that you have to live
  • Decide the outcome of storylines that are intertwined with your subordinates
  • Pick the right heir for the procreation

Battles:


  • Choose a location to invade the west
  • Recruit Vikings for massive and bloody battles
  • Get rich at the expense of the loot and pump your warriors
  • Choose a weapon to your liking and hit a tattoo on your face

Reign:


  • Unleash wars or negotiate peace with neighboring kingdoms
  • Find yourself a partner - out of love or for the sake of preserving the dynasty
  • Discover Vinlandia, visit Russia and southern countries
  • Feasts and make sacrifices for the glory of Odin

data.short_description: The burden of reign and the fate of the entire north now belongs to your dynasty. Rule as a ruthless, distraught and invincible viking, or as a tolerant konung who follows fashion trends. But remember that Valhalla is a place for worthy individuals.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 3.4 GHz / AMD CPU AMD FX-8350 4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 770 / AMD GPU Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
